name: Cabela's Dangerous Hunts 2011: Special Edition
overview: Cabela's Dangerous Hunts 2011 Special Edition sends you on a trek that is truly unlike anything Cabela's has ever undertaken. Journey to the wilds of Africa on a story-based safari where you will not just be hunting game, you will be fighting for your survival. American marksman Cole Rainsford joins his estranged father in Africa to hunt animals that have been terrorizing villages. But when their safari goes horribly wrong, they find themselves stuck in the wilderness, stalked by the world's deadliest animals. Survive intense kill-or-be-killed scenarios in a dramatic single-player storyline or in simultaneous co-op or versus two-player that won't limit your view of the stunning environments with a splitscreen. The Special Edition allows the player to choose from Cel shaded graphics & Normal graphics.
